local_intent: Execute a diagonal push of the T-shaped block toward the target outline, matching the active Push leaf (distance 0.1, direction 45°, timeout 1200 ms).
coherence_with_global: Keeps the detect→align→yaw→push→verify structure from the GLOBAL_BT and uses the same binned parameters (retries=3, tolerance=0.005, yaw=90, push distance=0.1, direction=45). Ends by checking the block is at the target.
